00042 class AbstractLookupTableCollection
00043 {
00044 public:
00048     AbstractLookupTableCollection();
00049 
00053     std::vector<std::string> GetKeyingVariableNames() const;
00054 
00060     unsigned GetNumberOfTables(const std::string& rKeyingVariableName) const;

00081

00090

00095

00098 
00102     class EventHandler : public GenericEventHandler<1, EventHandler>
00103     {
00104     public:
00106         static const char* EventName[1];
00107 
00109         typedef enum
00110         {
00111             GENERATE_TABLES=0
00112         } EventType;
00113     };
00114 
00115 protected:
00121     unsigned GetTableIndex(const std::string& rKeyingVariableName) const;
